text: "Farther Up the Road" or "Further Up the Road" is a 1957 blues song first recorded by Bobby Bland. It is an early influential Texas guitar shuffle from the 1940s blues style to the 1960s blues rock style. It has been covered by many blues artists including Eric Clapton. == References == Category:1957 songs Category:Blues music Category:Bobby Bland songs Category:Eric Clapton songs
title: Farther Up the Road
